p: A total of 500 g PF was decocted with boiling water twice (1:8 and 1:6), for 1 h each time. The same operation was carried out with 500 g SPF. Then, the combined decoction was concentrated and dried in vacuum to obtain PF extracts (48.1 g) and SPF extracts (62.6 g), respectively. The extracts were stored at 4 °C before analysis and administration.
